mapper.select: select group_id, group_name, group_title, group_img, start_date, end_date, total_cnt, today_cnt from group g inner join usergroup u on g.group_id = u.group_id where u.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into group (group_name, group_title, group_img, start_date, end_date, total_cnt, today_cnt) values (#{groupName}, #{groupTitle}, #{groupImg}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{totalCnt}, #{todayCnt})
